name: Flask-Dance with GitHub
description: Testing Flask-Dance's OAuth integration with GitHub

GITHUB_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: The OAuth client ID for your application, assigned by GitHub

GITHUB_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The OAuth client secret for your application, assigned by GitHub

GITHUB_USERNAME.description: The name of the GitHub user from whom the repo will be forked

GITHUB_REPO.description: The name of the GitHub repository which will be forked

FLASK_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.
